document_data.caption: A map showing the course of the Starwater River.
document_data.name: Starwater River
document_data.mainbody: The '''Starwater River''' was a river in [[Cormyr]]. It flowed south from the [[Storm Horns]] mountain range, through the [[King's Forest]], to the [[Dragonmere]]. The city of [[Marsember]] was situated on the western bank of the mouth of the river.
document_data.Description:
The Starwater carved the land into a [[Eveningstar Gorge|gorge]] just north of the town of [[Eveningstar]], where it cut through the [[Stonecliff]].

The river was populated by treacherous sandbars, which made it dangerous to those who were not familiar with them.

The most southerly rapids were in [[Redhand Pool]] in [[Eveningstar]], although boats needed to be fairly narrow to navigate the [[Mouth o' Gargoyles]].
